cards.description: [ACTIVATED] Deal damage to a Champion equal to 20 X the number of 'Charge Shot' in your Grave.
[ACTIVATED] Draw cards equal to the number of 'Charging' in your Grave +1.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy 1 'Sacred Spring' you control then Deal 40 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy 1 Equipment you control then Deal 30 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Draw cards equal to the number of Spells in your Grave then Discard the same number of cards.
